refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Fast table opcodes. Faster than table and tablew because don't allow wrap-around and limit and don't check index validity. Have been implemented in order to provide fast access to arrays. Support non-power of two tables (can be generated by any GEN function by giving a negative length value).

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ixmode -- defaults to zero. If zero xndx and ixoff ranges match the length of the table; if non zero xndx and ixoff have a 0 to 1 range.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: asig, ksig -- input signal to write.
tab and tabw opcodes are similar to table and tablew, but are faster and support tables having non-power-of-two length.
Special care of index value must be taken into account. Index values out of the table allocated space will crash Csound.
